quest.name: Revolting Refreshments
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The spirited and dispirited pixies are unimpressed with Urianger.
objectives: Deliver the heavy barrel to the dispirited pixie.
Obtain a fragrant treat from the antique cabinet.
Deliver the fragrant treat to the dispirited pixie.

dialogue.name: PIXIEB03400
dialogue.text: Hmph! Urianger doesn't pay any attention to us anymore!

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: Of late, Urianger has been paying us no mind. He always used to have time for us, but now he is busy with other things. He leaves us with no choice but to play tricks on him.

dialogue.name: PIXIEB03400
dialogue.text: That's right! We're going to play tricks on Urianger, and you're going to help us prepare them!

dialogue.name: PIXIEB03400
dialogue.text: First of all, we'll need to draw water from Handmirror Lake. Come and meet me by the water!

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: My spirited friend awaits you by the lake. Off you go, now.

dialogue.name: PIXIEB03400
dialogue.text: For our trick, we need nice, clean water, and I want you to carry it. But normal carrying is insufferably boring.

dialogue.name: PIXIEB03400
dialogue.text: That's why I've asked the faeries who dwell in these parts to make an exciting game out of it!

dialogue.name: PIXIEB03400
dialogue.text: Try to carry the water back to the Bookman's Shelves without dying, you hear? And don't be too slow either. Slow is boring!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Deliver the heavy barrel to the dispirited pixie at the Bookman's Shelves.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have ninety seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Be wary of attacks from enemies, which will sap your strength.

dialogue.name: PIXIEB03400
dialogue.text: Spilled the water, did you? Oh well, you'll just have to start over!

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: Oh? I was under the impression you were to bring me water. Better head back to the lake...and best of luck making it back.

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: Well, well, you actually came back alive. Most don't, so give yourself a pat on the back.

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: Hm? How will we use this water, you ask? We'll boil it and then pour it into a pot with some withered leaves. This produces a foul, brown water that Urianger absolutely loathes.

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: Now, while I prepare the water, I want you to go and fetch a fragrant treat from the cabinet over in the corner. That's another thing that Urianger loathes.

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: The fragrant treat should be in the cabinet yonder. Go and fetch it while I prepare the water.

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: Did you find the treat?

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: Good, good. Now everything is in readiness. Heh heh, I can't wait to see the look on Urianger's face when we offer this to him.

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: ...But hmmm, my friend sure is taking their time. Let's go and find them.

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: Here they are. They were just smelling the flowers on the way.

dialogue.name: PIXIEB03400
dialogue.text: The preparations are in order? Excellent! All that remains is to await Urianger's return!

dialogue.name: PIXIEA03400
dialogue.text: Tee hee, we never tire of seeing him gag as he sips the brown water! But he's so polite, he always drinks it to the last drop. Why, I almost feel sorry for him! Anyway, our thanks for helping us. Let's do it again sometime!
